name: Creter MINI 20mm nozzle
machine_end_gcode:
; End G-code for Creter MINI
G91 ; Relative positioning
G1 Z10 F300 ; Move Z up
G90 ; Absolute positioning
G1 X0 Y0 F3000 ; Move to home
M84 ; Disable motors
machine_start_gcode:
; Start G-code for Creter MINI Concrete Printer
G28 ; Home all axes
G90 ; Absolute positioning
G1 Z5 F300 ; Move Z up
G1 X10 Y10 F3000 ; Move to start position
G1 Z0.5 F300 ; Lower Z
